details.name: AtaraPay
details.description: AtaraPay is a mobile app developed to guarantee online fraud prevention during eCommerce transactions by acting as a holding account and a trusted third party between the buyer and the seller. The buyer pays into the holding account and the seller is only credited if the buyer confirms that the goods or service is in good condition. It is also designed to protect transactions for third party or brokered transactions such as marketplace transactions that involve the buyer, seller and a service provider.
features: Multiple Payment Options (PayPal, Paystack, Monnify)
Local and Cross border Transactions (Supports USD and NGN Currencies)
Supports eCommerce of Goods including Services
Stress-Free Delivery of Goods
Dispute Resolution Portal
APIs and Plugins for Seamless Integration

details.name: MTN BizApp
details.description: MTN BizApp is a mobile app developed specifically to cater for Small and Medium Businesses (SMB) subscribed to the MTN network across all its Operating Companies in Africa and the Middle East. It is designed to help SMBs leverage Social Media as an online growth strategy.
features: Facebook, Instagram and Google Business social media dashboards
Messaging services including Bulk SMS
Business Directory of registered businesses
Instant Messaging amongst registered businesses
Customer Service
Robust Reporting

details.name: Online Inverter Monitoring Solution
details.description: The bank's maintenance department was challenged with the ability to monitor availability of its ATMs located at remote sites. When there is a power outage, the ATM's backup power kicks in but goes off after a while. This costs the bank millions in service downtime, battery refresh, hardware fixes, and application uptime. Our online inverter monitoring solution (IMS) provided the maintenance department a cloud service that enables Stanbic to monitor the ATMs availability online from the comfort of their office.
features: View list of all sites installed from the IMS cloud portal
Ability to configure and update the IoT logger remotely from the IMS cloud portal
View online voltage and state of charge per battery at every point in time
Historical report of battery and inverter performance
Graphic display of battery string graph and charge/ discharge current
Online chart reporting of real-time battery and inverter status
Alarm threshold notifications sent via email or SMS, when the frequency and voltage is not suitable for proactive monitoring
Ability to set customized threshold of key battery performance indicator
Centralized dashboard monitoring of inverter irrespective of inverter model or type or brand
Keep alarm logs

details.name: Cloud Hotspot Service at National Youth Service Corp (NYSC) Camps
details.description: This is an ongoing marketing innovation started by Leadway in the country. The project provides free Wi-Fi internet access to NYSC candidates at the camps during their 3 weeks orientation into the service. This solution advertises Leadway and its services on the hotspot and captures data of the corpers for follow up after the exercise.
features: Online and real-time reporting of user access and registrations
Supported up to 500 concurrent users within the major campuses
Provided online monitoring of the hotspot routers proactively informing of downtimes and delivering resolutions in real-time
Provided in-app advertising
Authentication of emails and form validation of NYSC call-up numbers
Deployment of Mikrotik Cloud Core Hotspot routers at the core
Deployment of Mikrotik and Ubiquity indoor and outdoor Access Points for full coverage across key locations on campus
Deployed power cabling and inverter systems powered by solar and diesel generators
Implemented structured cabling including fiber and copper cable campus wide
24/7 support

details.name: Masque
details.description: This is an arts and craft online marketplace designed to bridge the gap between lovers of art and artists. It provides artists an account management portal which allows them to upload their artworks and sell them via the Masque marketplace. The service also includes image manipulation for framing and printing.
features: eCommerce marketplace supporting Interswitch and PayPal
Shipment tracking via Email and SMS
Buyer, Merchant and Admin portals
Responsive 360 degrees image viewing of 3-D arts and crafts
Robust Reporting

details.name: Sailbond Shipping
details.description: This is a website developed for Sailbond Shipping Limited in the logistics and courier sector. The website was developed to allow the company have a web presence and also to enable her customers to track their shipment online from their website.
features: Brochure of its products and services
Online Shipment tracking
Integration to social network sites

details.name: MTN Bulk SMS
details.description: MTN Bulk SMS is a web-based portal dedicated to providing businesses the ability to market their goods and services using SMS. The web portal is developed specifically to cater for Small and Medium Businesses subscribed to the MTN network across all its Operating Companies in Africa and the Middle East.
features: Account Management
Messaging Management
Sub Account Management
2 Way SMS Service using short code
Reseller Panel
Robust Reporting
